NEW YORK -- Abu Hamza al - Masri , the Egyptian - born British cleric on trial in Manhattan , was found guilty of 11 terrorism charges on Monday by a federal jury in Manhattan .
The monthlong trial marks the second time this year that federal civilian prosecutors secured a swift conviction in a high - profile terrorism case .
